Anycast - Annotation Type in gmi.protocols
Marker Annotation for Specifying Anycast Protocol by application and used by ExternalGMIService to handle invocation.

C

ClientInvocationHandler - Class in gmi

Client side invocation hadler to handle the method invocation on server from client side.
createSkelton(Object) - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
createSkelton() creates the skelton for interfaces depends upon different interfaces server implements.

E

ExternalGMIListener - Interface in gmi
In GMI package, an external interface is an interface that declare a set of methods implemented by an object group that may be invoked from a remote Java virtual machine.
ExternalGMIService - Class in gmi
ExternalGMIService is used by sever side proxy to handle the Method invocation request by client.
ExternalGMIService(ServerSideProxy, Object) - Constructor for class gmi.ExternalGMIService
 
ExternalInvocationHandler - Class in gmi
This Object is used to handle the invocation on server application on receiving the request from clients or servers for External Methods.
ExternalInvocationHandler(ServerSideProxy, Object) - Constructor for class gmi.ExternalInvocationHandler
 
ExternalInvocationTimer - Class in gmi
ExternalInvocationTimer is used to check if the result during Multicast semantics is sent back or not.
ExternalInvocationTimer(ExternalGMIService, int, String) - Constructor for class gmi.ExternalInvocationTimer

getServer() is called by client application to get the server stub to get the service required by client application.
getServerAddress() - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy

getserverStub() - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy

getState() - Method in interface gmi.MergingListener
Method getState is invoked when the member has been selected as Leader for the Merging protocol.

Get the descriptor of a particular type, as appropriate for either a parameter or return type in a method descriptor.
getTypeDescriptor(Class) - Method in class gmi.MethodTable
Get the descriptor of a particular type, as appropriate for either a parameter or return type in a method descriptor.
getUpdateView(Message) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
this method multicast the message to get the update view of all the running servers at that time.
getView() - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
This method used to get the Vector of group members out of View Object which is received.
getView() - Method in class gmi.View
 
gmi - package gmi
 
gmi.protocols - package gmi.protocols
 
GroupProxy - Class in gmi
GroupProxy Object implements the AdvancedMessageListener interface provided by Spread java API to receive the message, it differentiate received message depending upon it's type which is either membership or regular and depending upon it's type it called corresponding method to handle it.
GroupProxy(Object, String, int, String, String) - Constructor for class gmi.GroupProxy
 
groupTimeOut() - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
This is called by TimeOut Object when it doesn't receive the acknowledgement for the message sent with in the specified time limit which is set to 1 sec.

I

InternalGMIListener - Interface in gmi
In GMI package, an internal interface is an interface that declare a set of methods implemented by an object group that invoked from a member of the group itself.
InternalGMIService - Class in gmi
InternalGMIService handles the method invocation which are internal to server groups these method are invoked by all the running members of group and return result is the array of Objects of size running members at the time of invocation.
InternalGMIService(ServerSideProxy, Object) - Constructor for class gmi.InternalGMIService
 
invoke(Object, Method, Object[]) - Method in class gmi.ClientInvocationHandler
Invoke method is called by java reflection every time when any method is called on methos object.
invoke(Object, Method, Object[]) - Method in class gmi.ExternalGMIService
This method is just to fulfill the condition of InvocationHandler java interface.
invoke(Object, Method, Object[]) - Method in class gmi.InternalGMIService
This method is invoked each time when any internal method is invoked on Internal interface reference proxy object.
invokeMethod(Method, String, String, Object[], String, Message) - Method in class gmi.ExternalGMIService
This method is invoked by serversideproxy to set the parameter from the received method invocation request from the client or one of the servers in multicast semantics case.
invokeMethod(Method, String, String, Object[], String, Message) - Method in class gmi.ExternalInvocationHandler
 
invokeMethod(Method, String, Object[], Object, String, String) - Method in class gmi.InternalGMIService
Method is invoked when serversideproxy receives the request from one of the member to invoke the internal method and send the result back to the sender who request the method invocation.
invokeMethod() - Method in class gmi.MembershipService
Method which actually invoke the methods declared in MembershipListener Interface.
isCompleted(int) - Method in class gmi.ExternalGMIService
This is used to check that either the request is completed or not by ExternalInvoationTimer.

J

join(String) - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
 

M

memberHasPosition(int, String) - Method in class gmi.View
 
MembershipListener - Interface in gmi
In order to be notified of membership events like view changes, an object must implement this interface.
membershipMessageReceived(SpreadMessage) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
 
membershipMessageReceived(SpreadMessage) - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
this method is invoked when membership message is received and it create a new thread to handle the message depending upon it's cause of triggering
MembershipService - Class in gmi
MembershipService Object is handling the membership changes in the server group.
MembershipService(ServerSideProxy, Object) - Constructor for class gmi.MembershipService
 
MergingListener - Interface in gmi
 
MergingService - Class in gmi
MergingService Object handles synchronization of Global State, Group Leader invokes the getGlobalState() method to get the global state of the group and multicast global state to group only newly created member or other members during partion merging update their global state by calling putGlobalState() method which actually invoke the method putState() declared in MergingListener interface.
MergingService(ServerSideProxy, Object) - Constructor for class gmi.MergingService
 
Message - Class in gmi
Message Object is the actual object which is passed during communication between two proxies.
Message() - Constructor for class gmi.Message
 
methodTable() - Method in class gmi.ClientInvocationHandler
This method is used to make the method table of declared methods in interface extending ExternalGMIListener, so that if client try to invoke undefined method then we raise error message saying method is not defined.
MethodTable - Class in gmi
MethodTable object maintains all the method define in server application based on particular interface implmented by application, and provide these mehtods to ServerSideProxy to invoke method on request from requestor.
MethodTable() - Constructor for class gmi.MethodTable
 
Multicast - Annotation Type in gmi.protocols
Marker Annotation for Specifying Multicast Protocol by application and used by ExternalGMIService to handle invocation.

N

notifyMerging(String) - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
notifyMerging() invokes the getGlobalState() from the leader to synchronize the global state with the newly created member or during partition merging.

P

putGlobalState(Object, String, String) - Method in class gmi.MergingService
 
putState(Object) - Method in interface gmi.MergingListener
Method putState is invoked to inform the member about the state of other members belonging to different partitions.

R

receivedUpdatedView(View) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
This method is called by regularMessageReceived() when it receive the message with signature "GetView" which contains the view of all running members at that instant of time.
regularMessageReceived(SpreadMessage) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
This method is called by spread when it receive the regular message and deliver the message to GroupProxy object.
regularMessageReceived(SpreadMessage) - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
this method is invoked when regular message is received and depend upon the methodSignature which is requested to be invoked it delivered message to particular Service Object according to that.
removeResult(int) - Method in class gmi.ExternalGMIService
 
removeServer(String) - Method in class gmi.View
 
resultTimeout(Object) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
 
ResultTimeout - Class in gmi
Timer in case if server crash after sending the acknowledgement of message received but befire sending the reply of requested service.
ResultTimeout(GroupProxy, String, SpreadMessage) - Constructor for class gmi.ResultTimeout
 
run() - Method in class gmi.ExternalInvocationHandler
 
run() - Method in class gmi.ExternalInvocationTimer
 
run() - Method in class gmi.MembershipService
serversideproxy create new thread on receiving membership message and run() method is executed by newly created thread according to cause of triggering of message it maintains the view of all the running members of the gorup and invoke Membershipchange method declared in MembershipListener Interface.
run() - Method in class gmi.MergingService
When the putState message is received by serversideproxy it create a new thread to handle the synchronization of global state and run() is executed by newly created thread to handle the method invocation for putting new state.
run() - Method in class gmi.ResultTimeout
 
run() - Method in class gmi.TimeOut
 

S

sendAnycast(String, Message) - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
sendAnycast() sends the anycast message to the receiver.
sendMessagetoServer(String, Message) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
This method sends the anycast message to receiver which is one of the member of servergroup.
sendMulticast(Serializable) - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
sendMulticast() multicast the message in the groupname to whom message is deleivered.
sendReply(int, String) - Method in class gmi.ExternalGMIService
This is used to send reply back in Multicast case.
ServerSideProxy - Class in gmi
ServerSideProxy Object implements the AdvancedMessageListener interface provided by Spread java API to receive the message, it differentiate received message depending upon it's type which is either membership or regular and depending upon it's type it called corresponding method to handle it.
ServerSideProxy(Object, int, String, String) - Constructor for class gmi.ServerSideProxy
 
setArgument(Object) - Method in class gmi.MembershipService
Set the argument to pass in the dynamic method invocation call, because we need arguments as array to pass in dynamic call, so we convert it to array.

setserverStub(Object) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
This method is called by regularMessageReceived() when it receive the message with signature "getServerStub" which contains the class name array of interfaces which implement the ExternalGMIListener interface.
setView(View) - Method in class gmi.MembershipService
 
setView(Vector<String>) - Method in class gmi.View
 
synchronizedView() - Method in class gmi.ServerSideProxy
synchronizedView() is called after the global state is synchronized within all the members and MergingService call this method.

T

timeOut(String, Object) - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
This is called by TimeOut Object when it doesn't receive the acknowledgement for the message sent with in the specified time limit which is set to 1 sec.
TimeOut - Class in gmi
TomeOut Object is used to set the timer when GroupProxy sends the message to serversideproxy and if it receives the reply with in specified time which is currently set to 1 sec then it do nothing and if groupproxy doen't receive reply with in time limit it specify timeout or grouptimeout depending upon the message is sent to one server or group.
TimeOut(GroupProxy, String, SpreadMessage, boolean) - Constructor for class gmi.TimeOut
 
toString() - Method in class gmi.View
 

U

updateView() - Method in class gmi.GroupProxy
updateView() creates a message to send to group to get all the running servers in the servergroup to get the service.

V

View - Class in gmi
View Object maintains the view of all the running members of the group this is used by Membershipservice object to maintain the updated view of members.
View() - Constructor for class gmi.View
 
ViewChange(View) - Method in interface gmi.MembershipListener
Upcall invoked on members implementing the MembershipListener interface, when a view change occurs.
